pages.text: Well, I recently found that my materials for researching were gone.$(br2)They are old scrolls. If someone could help me find them, my progress of smithing Blade will be more quickly.$(br2)It is greatly appreciated to help me organize them.

Note left by Someone:$(br2)This note used to be hung on the door of Zheng's hut. If you find the scrolls, they are at your disposal. Zheng will never need them anymore.$(br2)--The Third Cycle of Lunar Calendar,$(br)The year of Star, Summer and Water,$(br)Mutsuki
